name: Empty (itch)
description:
Empty is a rouge-like without loot, or anything else really. Play as a small hooded figure, quick on the heels of an epic hero. Complete with skeletons, ghosts, and an ambient sense of EMPTINESS. Journey to get absolutely nothing.

Developed in 48 hours (down to the wire) for the GMTK 2k18 Game Jam.

This is our third game jam, and an anniversary of sorts, given the first jam we ever participated in was the first GMTK Game Jam. Please fell free to let us know how we did.

Thanks,

Giggles & Glasses

Known Bugs:

player death breaks game

not all sounds play

will be updating the download shortly and adding web player (waiting for web player to export)

Please check out the temporary page for more platform build options or if you are interested with what we were aiming for over the 48 hour period. (NOTE: The temporary link and page will be deleted once the rating process is over.):

https://gigglesandglasses.itch.io/empty-fixed-post-jame
